verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they turn <S%H7725><s%> back and encamp <S%H2583><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pihahiroth, <S%H6367><s%> between Migdol <S%H4024><s%> and the sea, <S%H3220><s%> before <S%H5226><s%> Baal <S%H1189><s%> Zephon. <S%H2583><s%> You shall encamp opposite <S%H6440><s%> it by the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> will say <S%H559><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> <S%H943><s%> 'They are entangled in the land. <S%H776><s%> The wilderness <S%H4057><s%> has shut them in. <S%H5462><s%>'

I will harden <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart, <S%H3820><s%> and he will follow <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them; <S%H3513><s%> and I will get honor over Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and over all his armies; <S%H2428><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>" They did so. <S%H6213><s%>

It was told <S%H5046><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> had fled; <S%H1272><s%> and the heart <S%H3824><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and of his servants <S%H5650><s%> was changed <S%H2015><s%> towards the people, <S%H5971><s%> and they said, <S%H559><s%> "What is this we have done, <S%H6213><s%> that we have let Israel <S%H3478><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> from serving us? <S%H5647><s%>"
He prepared <S%H631><s%> his chariot, <S%H7393><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> his army with him; <S%H5971><s%>

and he took <S%H3947><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chosen <S%H977><s%> chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and all the chariots <S%H7393><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and captains over all of them. <S%H7991><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and he pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> with a high <S%H7311><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

The Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them: <S%H5483><s%> all the horses and chariots <S%H7393><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> his horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> and his army; <S%H2428><s%> and overtook <S%H5381><s%> them encamping <S%H2583><s%> by the sea, <S%H3220><s%> beside Pihahiroth, <S%H6367><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Baal Zephon. <S%H1189><s%>

When Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> drew near, <S%H7126><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and behold, <S%H4714><s%> the Egyptians were marching <S%H5265><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them; <S%H3966><s%> and they were very afraid. <S%H3372><s%> The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried out <S%H6817><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

They said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Because there were no graves <S%H6913><s%> in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> have you taken us away <S%H3947><s%> to die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness? <S%H4057><s%> Why <S%H2063><s%> have you treated <S%H6213><s%> us this way, <S%H3318><s%> to bring us out of Egypt? <S%H4714><s%>

Isn't <S%H1697><s%> this the word that we spoke <S%H1696><s%> to you in Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H2308><s%> 'Leave us alone, that we may serve <S%H5647><s%> the Egyptians? <S%H4714><s%>' For it were better <S%H2896><s%> for us to serve <S%H5647><s%> the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> than that we should die <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid. Stand still, <S%H3320><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> the salvation <S%H3444><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> which he will work <S%H6213><s%> for you today: <S%H3117><s%> for the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> whom you have seen <S%H7200><s%> today, <S%H3117><s%> you shall <S%H5704><s%> never <S%H5769><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> them again. <S%H3254><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will fight <S%H3898><s%> for you, <S%H2790><s%> and you shall be still."

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Why do you cry <S%H6817><s%> to me? <S%H1696><s%> Speak to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they go forward. <S%H5265><s%>

Lift up <S%H7311><s%> your rod, <S%H4294><s%> and stretch out <S%H5186><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> over the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and divide <S%H1234><s%> it: <S%H1121><s%> and the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall go <S%H935><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> on dry ground. <S%H3004><s%>

I, <S%H2388><s%> behold, I will harden the hearts <S%H3820><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and they shall go in after <S%H935><s%> them: <S%H310><s%> and I will get myself honor <S%H3513><s%> over Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and over all his armies, <S%H2428><s%> over his chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and over his horsemen. <S%H6571><s%>

The Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when I have gotten myself honor <S%H3513><s%> over Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> over his chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and over his horsemen. <S%H6571><s%>"

The angel <S%H4397><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> who went <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> moved <S%H5265><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> them; <S%H5982><s%> and the pillar of cloud <S%H6051><s%> moved <S%H5265><s%> from before them, <S%H6440><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> behind them. <S%H310><s%>

It came <S%H935><s%> between the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and there was the cloud <S%H6051><s%> and the darkness, <S%H2822><s%> yet gave it light <S%H215><s%> by night: <S%H3915><s%> and the one didn't <S%H7126><s%> come near the other <S%H2088><s%> all the night. <S%H3915><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched out <S%H5186><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> over the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> caused the sea <S%H3220><s%> to go <S%H3212><s%> back by a strong <S%H5794><s%> east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> all the night, <S%H3915><s%> and made <S%H7760><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> dry <S%H2724><s%> land, <S%H4325><s%> and the waters were divided. <S%H1234><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> on the dry <S%H3004><s%> ground, <S%H4325><s%> and the waters were a wall <S%H2346><s%> to them on their right hand, <S%H3225><s%> and on their left. <S%H8040><s%>

The Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> pursued, <S%H7291><s%> and went in <S%H935><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea: <S%H3220><s%> all of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s horses, <S%H5483><s%> his chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and his horsemen. <S%H6571><s%>

It happened in the morning <S%H1242><s%> watch, <S%H821><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> looked <S%H8259><s%> out on the Egyptian <S%H4714><s%> army <S%H4264><s%> through the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> and of cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and confused <S%H2000><s%> the Egyptian <S%H4714><s%> army. <S%H4264><s%>

He took off <S%H5493><s%> their chariot <S%H4818><s%> wheels, <S%H212><s%> and they drove <S%H5090><s%> them heavily; <S%H3517><s%> so that the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let <S%H5127><s%>'s flee from the face <S%H6440><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> fights <S%H3898><s%> for them against the Egyptians! <S%H4714><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Stretch out <S%H5186><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> over the sea, <S%H3220><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> may come again <S%H7725><s%> on the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> on their chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and on their horsemen. <S%H6571><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched out <S%H5186><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> over the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and the sea <S%H3220><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to its strength <S%H386><s%> when the morning <S%H1242><s%> appeared; <S%H6437><s%> and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> it. <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh overthrew <S%H5287><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea. <S%H3220><s%>

The waters <S%H4325><s%> returned, <S%H7725><s%> and covered <S%H3680><s%> the chariots <S%H7393><s%> and the horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> even all Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s army <S%H2428><s%> that went <S%H935><s%> in after <S%H310><s%> them into the sea. <S%H3220><s%> There remained <S%H7604><s%> not so much as <S%H5704><s%> one of them. <S%H259><s%>

But the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> on dry <S%H3004><s%> land in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> were a wall <S%H2346><s%> to them on their right hand, <S%H3225><s%> and on their left. <S%H8040><s%>

Thus Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians; <S%H4714><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%> on the <S%H3220><s%> seashore. <S%H8193><s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> work <S%H3027><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and they believed <S%H539><s%> in Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and in his servant <S%H5650><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
